com.meltmedia.cadmium.core.config.impl
Class YamlConfigurationParser

java.lang.Object
  com.meltmedia.cadmium.core.config.impl.YamlConfigurationParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationParser
public class YamlConfigurationParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationParser

A Yaml based implementation of the ConfigurationParser.

The yaml configuration file need to have the root keys be the same as the environment name. The next level key needs to match the name of a key that the configuration uses in the CadmiumConfig annotation. All configuration elements below that level need to match the field names and types or the pojo class that was wired in.

The following is an example of a yaml configuration file:

 default:
   email: !email
     &email
     jndiName: 'java:/Mail'
     sessionStrategy: 'com.meltmedia.cadmium.email.JndiSessionStrategy'
     messageTransformer: 'com.meltmedia.cadmium.email.IdentityMessageTransformer'
 production:
   email: !email
     <<: *email
     jndiName: 'java/ProdMail'

Author:
John McEntire
